sources.title: Phantom of 42nd Street (1945) MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Dave O'Brien, Kay Aldridge, Alan Mowbray
 Director: Albert Herman

 A theater critic teams up with a cop to investigate the murder of a Broadway actor.

sources.title: The Phantom of 42nd Street (1945) Mystery Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Tony, a theatre critic, teams up with a cop  Lt. Walsh  to investigate the murder of a Broadway actor.

Director: Albert Herman
Writers: Jack Harvey, Milton Raison
Stars: Dave O'Brien, Kay Aldridge, Alan Mowbray
Genres: Classics, Mystery

metadata.Plot: An actor is killed during the performance of a play and critic Tony Woolrich (Dave O'Brien) undertakes to solve the crime. Claudia Moore (Kay Aldridge, in her last movie role), the girl he loves, is suspected, but when two more deaths occur, she is also threatened by the Phantom Killer. During a production of "Julius Caesar" the killer makes a final attempt.
metadata.Actors: Dave O'Brien, Kay Aldridge, Alan Mowbray
